definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="313" y="158"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"you pooped","bold":true,"color":"yellow"}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="explode"><field name="mode">DESTROY</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
